name: Unholy Waterways
description:
Whoever built this place definitely did not think these pipes would actually be used, either that, or this place is cursed. Well in any case, someone's going to have to repair these leaks.

Made for Kenney jam 2020, quickly bodged together but still came short of the deadline

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - repair leaks

Music from Zapsplat
